snippet: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center performed a revelatory Kodaly Duo, selections from Schumann and Brahms, and the American premiere of Zhou Long’s “Tales From the Nine Bells.”
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center of various works, including some unfamiliar entities, at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center performed a revelatory Kodaly Duo, selections from Schumann and Brahms, and the American premiere of Zhou Long’s “Tales From the Nine Bells.”

headline.seo: Chamber Music Society Performs ‘Tales From the Nine Bells’
headline.main: From Mystical Bells to a Hungarian Folk Duo, the Joys of the Unfamiliar
headline.print_headline: From Mystical Bells to a Hungarian Folk Duo, the Joys of the Unfamiliar

keywords.value: Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
